command.name: Context tools
command.description: Shows context menu with database tools

fontDefinition.label: Results grid font
fontDefinition.description: The grid font is used for result set cells, header and rows number.

fontDefinition.label: SQL output font
fontDefinition.description: Font to show SQL output. Preferred to be a monospace font.

keyword.label: auto commit cursor rollback resultset lob script
format date number string locale language
object entity schema catalog table package column

transformer.name: Complex type
transformer.description: Shows complex type attributes as separate columns

transformer.name: Map
transformer.description: Evaluate structure/map as a set of separate columns

transformer.name: Array
transformer.description: Evaluate complex array elements as a set of separate columns

transformer.name: Epoch Time
transformer.description: Represents integer value as timestamp in Epoch (C, Unix, POSIX, Java, etc) time - the number of seconds that have elapsed since 1970/01/01 00:00:00 (UTC)

transformer.name: Number Radix
transformer.description: Represents numbers in a specified radix

transformer.name: URL
transformer.description: Represents value as URL. Provides preview panel with inline web browser.

property.label: URL pattern
property.description: URL pattern. Variable ${value} will be replaced with real value.
